Features
--------

- Easily reference and edit your language's

  - Phonology
  - Orthography
  - Dictionary
  - Grammar

- Define the language's grammar using

  - `Regexp`_
  - cLa syntax

- Apply one or more grammar rules to a word or conjugate an entire passage
